articles.title: Death toll rises in flood-hit Central Europe - BBC.com
articles.description: Several people have died across the Czech Republic, Austria, Romania and Poland following devastating floods.
articles.content:
A flooded area in Nysa, Poland
The death toll from the floods that hit central Europe over the weekend has risen, with more casualties recorded in the Czech Republic, Poland and Austria.
